meanings.sent1: The inthralling story kept the children spellbound during storytime.
meanings.sent2: The inthralling movie had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: The inthralling magic show made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The inthralling sunset painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The inthralling music filled the room with a sense of wonder.

meanings.definition: Holding the attention or interest of someone
meanings.sent1: The inthralling mystery novel had readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent2: The inthralling speech by the president captivated the entire nation.
meanings.sent3: The inthralling game of charades kept the family entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: The inthralling dance performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The inthralling painting drew viewers in with its intricate details.
